attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With huge rises in gas and electricity bills with added profits for share holders which are unafordable to the working class we request these utilities be nationalised to cut out profits to shareholders of these companies who profit on the poverty of working class people .Privatisation does not cut costs to the end user as promised but gives poorly regulated utility suppliers the chance to profit at the cost of us poor.We request Electricity and gas and water companies be re-nationalised as soon as possible to avert civil unrest

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
